title: feat: make 5 models paid-only and migrate Mistral to OVHcloud
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Tiers, gears, and Mistral
gist.blurb: We're tidying up the hive! Mistral gets a new engine, and we've organized some heavy-hitter models into our supporter tiers to keep the platform blooming.
gist.summary: Migrated Mistral inference to OVHcloud infrastructure and updated access configurations for premium models like Claude and Grok.
gist.impact: Supporter tiers now have exclusive access to high-compute models, ensuring sustainable availability for everyone.
gist.visual_concept: A bee sorting valuable gems (models) into a special 'supporter' chest, representing the new tier organization. The setting is a cozy cloud workshop (OVH migration).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a cute bee mascot sorting glowing magical gems into a golden treasure chest in a cloud workshop. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Represents premium model tiers. Lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee carefully tending to a special garden section with glowing rare crystal flowers. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Bee character with chunky retro sprites moving a cloud-shaped plant to a new pot. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
